column5: Hello everyone,  Can anybody tell me if there is a website,webcam or anything that would let me know if the rivers are fishable? I am looking to fish any Huron trib tomorrow in the Bruce area. I don't want to drive and hour or two only to find that river is full of ice and unfishable. I know the website for the river levels, just want to make sure the river is not full of ice.I am fishing alone if anybody wants to hook up shoot me a PM.
The temps are supposed to be just slightly below zero tonite so the slush(frazil) ice should be minimal.
I would keep an eye on those flowcharts.
Thx guys. I dont want to arrive and find the river full of ice....
